DOC.detailed_description: Acceptability tolerance test conduct 10 healthy male adult volunteer 10 ( 40 - 60 year age ) , child ( 9-13 year age ) . All participant ask consume 50g test product every day 2 week adult volunteer , child ask consume product every day one week . The participant record amount daily intake , give entry exit survey . These survey include assessment potential gastrointestinal change daily product intake , include question like product . Acceptability measure number serving portion serve complete day trial period . In adult , fast blood sample spot urine collect towards preliminary work potential change metabolome lipidome inclusion test product within habitual diet .
